author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
John Carpenter’s The Thing (1982) is a sci-fi horror based on a short story, Who Goes There?, by John W. Campbell Jr that was published at the height of eldritch horror serialisations in the 1930s. Not to be confused with 1951’s film The Thing from Another World, Carpenter’s rendition has since become a cult classic […]

The post REVIEW: The Thing (1982) appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Thing (1982)
